data.message: Design Trends 2024-2026: Contemporary patterns - Glassmorphism 2.0 (frosted glass with subtle gradients), Bento Grids (asymmetric card layouts), Variable Fonts (weight/width animation), Mesh Gradients, 3D elements with depth, Micro-interactions. Dated patterns to avoid: flat material design, hamburger menus on desktop, generic stock imagery, overly minimal "startup" aesthetic, pure white backgrounds (#fff), perfect geometric shapes without variation. Trend application: Use sparingly as accents, not wholesale adoption.
